mapper.insert: insert into BUY (BNO, BDATE, PAY, TOTALPRICE, MID, GID, BCOUNT) value(#{BNO},#{BDATE},#{PAY},#{TOTALPRICE},#{MID},#{GID},#{BCOUNT})
INSERT INTO buy (BNO, BDATE, PAY, TOTALPRICE, MID, GID , BCOUNT) VALUES (BNO_SEQ.nextval, sysdate, #{pay}, #{totalprice}, #{mid}, #{gid}, #{bcount})
mapper.select: select b.gid gid, b.bdate bdate, g.gname gname, b.bcount bcount, b.totalprice totalprice, b.pay pay, g.delivery delivery, g.dcost dcost, (g.dcost+b.totalprice) totalorderprice from buy b, goods g where b.gid=g.gid and b.mid=#{mid} order by b.bdate desc

mapper.update: update goods set count=count-1 where gid=#{gid}
